repair.repairedDockerfile:
FROM golang:1.19-buster AS Builder

ARG var_version=devel
ENV VERSION=$var_version

RUN mkdir -p /src
COPY . /src/gopherCap
WORKDIR /src/gopherCap

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y libpcap-dev
RUN go build -ldflags="-X 'gopherCap/cmd.Version=${VERSION}'" -o /tmp/gopherCap ./

FROM debian:buster
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y libpcap0.8 && apt-get -y autoremove && apt-get -y autoclean && apt-get clean
COPY --from=Builder /tmp/gopherCap /usr/local/bin/
ENTRYPOINT [ "/usr/local/bin/gopherCap" ]
